right_elbow_angle: Fully extend elbow but keep relaxed for smooth follow.
right_shoulder_angle: Keep shoulder relaxed for smooth follow.
right_hip_angle: Extend hips fully but stay balanced.
right_knee_angle: Extend knees fully but stay balanced.
left_knee_angle: Extend knees fully with symmetry for stable landing.

right_elbow_angle: Keep elbow tucked for smooth transition to release.
right_shoulder_angle: Keep shoulder lower for consistent setup.
right_hip_angle: Maintain slight hip bend for balance.
right_knee_angle: Extend knees slightly for smoother transition.
left_elbow_angle: Keep guide elbow slightly bent for proper setup.
left_wrist_angle: Keep guide wrist neutral for alignment.
left_hip_angle: Maintain slight hip bend for symmetry.
left_knee_angle: Extend knees slightly for smoother transition.

right_elbow_angle: Reduces power storage due to insufficient bend.
Bend the elbow more to store energy for the shot.
right_shoulder_angle: Elevate shoulder slightly for better setup.
right_hip_angle: Bend hips more for increased power.
right_knee_angle: Reduce knee bend slightly for better mobility.
left_elbow_angle: Extend guide elbow slightly for better control.
left_hip_angle: Reduce hip bend slightly for better balance.
left_knee_angle: Reduce knee bend slightly for better balance.

right_elbow_angle: Early extension leads to flat trajectory.
Release with a slight elbow bend for better arc.
right_wrist_angle: Excessive snap may cause erratic release.
Moderate wrist snap for better control.
right_hip_angle: Fully extend hips while maintaining balance.
left_knee_angle: Fully extend knees for maximum power.
